title: The Co-Creators of HBO's New Series "Industry"
itunes:title: The Co-Creators of HBO's New Series "Industry"
description:
A conversation with Mickey Down and Konrad Kay, the writers and co-creators of HBO’s new drama series "Industry."

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
